item.title: Call For Speakers Is Open!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description: The Call for Speakers is now open! Submissions are due by July 1 11:59pm (ET). Notification of accepted proposals will happen by August 5th, 2016. Tickets and Sponsorship Opportunities are still available as… Read More »Call For Speakers Is Open!
item.content:encoded:
The Call for Speakers is now open! Submissions are due by July 1 11:59pm (ET).

Notification of accepted proposals will happen by August 5th, 2016.

Tickets and Sponsorship Opportunities are still available as well.

item.title: Fellowship Call Is Open!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description: The Summit team is excited to offer up to ten Open Hardware Fellowships to women and people of color within the community which includes a $500 travel stipend and a lunch or… Read More »Fellowship Call Is Open!
item.content:encoded: The Summit team is excited to offer up to ten Open Hardware Fellowships to women and people of color within the community which includes a $500 travel stipend and a lunch or dinner with select speakers. You can apply by filling out the application under ‘Fellowship’ in the above menu..!

item.title: Early Birds Get The.. Tixs!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description: We have launched early bird tickets this year (finally!) Numbers are limited (regular tickets at the regular prices will be available in the coming weeks).
item.content:encoded: We have launched early bird tickets this year (finally!) Numbers are limited (regular tickets at the regular prices will be available in the coming weeks).

item.title: Early Bird Tickets!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description: Next week we will be launching ticket sales, with a limited amount of early bird discounted tickets available. If you know you are coming to the Summit, now is the… Read More »Early Bird Tickets!
item.content:encoded:
Next week we will be launching ticket sales, with a limited amount of early bird discounted tickets available.

If you know you are coming to the Summit, now is the time to get your tickets at a discounted rate!

This is going to be a great year for the Open Hardware Summit, we are excited and thrilled to be coming to the West Coast and very much looking forward to seeing you all again in Portland.

-Addie

item.title: PDX Or Bust!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description: We’ve had a huge community request to host a Summit on the West Coast. We heard you! It’s happening!  We are thrilled that this years Open Hardware Summit will be… Read More »PDX Or Bust!
item.content:encoded:
We’ve had a huge community request to host a Summit on the West Coast. We heard you! It’s happening!  We are thrilled that this years Open Hardware Summit will be happening right in the prime of Portland, Oregon.

Just across from the venue is Powell’s Bookstore, which is famous for being the  largest independent chain of bookstores in the world, and when you visit the flagship shop, Powell’s City of Books, you’ll need a map, it really is a city. We aren’t kidding. PDX is also famous for it’s food cart culture. From the posse at SW 10th Ave. and Alder St., Nong’s Khao Man Gai cart is not to be missed: utilizing the make-one-thing-but-make-it-great approach, Nong, a Bangkok native, offers khao man gai, an amazing Thai chicken dish which is to DIE FOR. Then there is Voodoo Donuts- its where the donut culture started.

Leading up to the Summit we will be posted suggestions on what to see in the city of Roses. See you in October!

item.title: Hello World!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description: The Call for Speakers is now open! Submissions are due by July 1 11:59pm (ET). Welcome to the 2016 Open Hardware Summit! We are glad you are here! We are working every… Read More »Hello World!
item.content:encoded:
The Call for Speakers is now open! Submissions are due by July 1 11:59pm (ET).

Welcome to the 2016 Open Hardware Summit! We are glad you are here! We are working every day to get more information online for you. Please check back in early Feb for tickets, call of speakers and so on. In the meantime, we have all the sponsorship information available online!

We look forward to welcoming you all to Portland, Oregon!

Notification of accepted proposals will happen by August 5th, 2016.

Tickets and Sponsorship Opportunities are still available as well.
